active_issue.title: [Web | Android] Google Login & Cloud Backup
active_issue.body:
# üéØ Objective
Implement Google Sign-In authentication and automatic backup to Google Drive for data persistence across devices.

## üìù Specifications

### Phase 1: Google Sign-In
- [ ] **Google OAuth Integration**: Sign in with Google account
- [ ] **User Profile**: Display user name and avatar
- [ ] **Session Management**: Remember login state, auto-refresh tokens
- [ ] **Logout**: Clear session and local data option

### Phase 2: Google Drive Backup
- [ ] **Auto Backup**: Automatically backup database to Google Drive
- [ ] **Manual Backup**: Button to trigger immediate backup
- [ ] **Restore**: Restore data from Google Drive backup
- [ ] **Sync Indicator**: Show last backup time and sync status
- [ ] **Conflict Resolution**: Handle merge conflicts between devices

### Data to Backup
- [ ] Transactions
- [ ] Jar configurations
- [ ] User preferences
- [ ] App settings

## üîó References
- **Feature ID**: `AUTH-01`, `SYNC-01`
- **Google APIs**: Google Sign-In, Google Drive API

## üèóÔ∏è Implementation Guidelines
- **Web**: Google Sign-In for Web, Drive REST API
- **Android**: Google Sign-In SDK, Drive API
- **Security**: OAuth 2.0, encrypted backup files
- **Offline**: Queue backups when offline, sync when online
